model.arena

Interface Arena

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArenaImpl

    public interface Arena
    This Interface contains any entities and stores also in another field the hero, the goal and the various bullet in order to manage better them by the @ArenaManager. This interface used the Visitor pattern in order to understand the entity that the model sent to the arena and put it in the right field.
    Author:
    josephgiovanelli

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(Bullet bullet)
      This method is the specific method that @EntitiesVisitor called in order to put a bullet.
      void add(Entities entities)
      With this method the Model can add any entity.
      void add(EntitiesImpl entitiesImpl)
      This method is the specific method that @EntitiesVisitor called in order to put an entity that isn't the hero, or a bullet.
      void add(HeroImpl hero)
      This method is the specific method that @EntitiesVisitor called in order to put the hero.
      java.util.List<Bullet> getBullets()
      With this method the @Model or the @ArenaManager can get the bullets.
      java.util.List<Entities> getEntities()
      With this method the @Model or the @ArenaManager can get the entities.
      Entities getGoal()
      With this method the @Model or the @ArenaManager can get the goal.
      Hero getHero()
      With this method the @Model or the @ArenaManager can get the hero.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        void add(Entities entities)
        With this method the Model can add any entity. This method call another object, called @EntitiesVisitor, that recognize the instance of the entity and call the right method @add
        Parameters:
        entities - : a generic entity.

      • add

        void add(EntitiesImpl entitiesImpl)
        This method is the specific method that @EntitiesVisitor called in order to put an entity that isn't the hero, or a bullet.
        Parameters:
        entitiesImpl - : the entity that are passed.

      • add

        void add(HeroImpl hero)
        This method is the specific method that @EntitiesVisitor called in order to put the hero.
        Parameters:
        hero - : the hero that are passed.

      • add

        void add(Bullet bullet)
        This method is the specific method that @EntitiesVisitor called in order to put a bullet.
        Parameters:
        bullet - : the bullet that are passed.

      • getHero

        Hero getHero()
        With this method the @Model or the @ArenaManager can get the hero.
        Returns:
        : the hero that you want.

      • getGoal

        Entities getGoal()
        With this method the @Model or the @ArenaManager can get the goal.
        Returns:
        : the goal that you want.

      • getEntities

        java.util.List<Entities> getEntities()
        With this method the @Model or the @ArenaManager can get the entities.
        Returns:
        : the entities that you want.

      • getBullets

        java.util.List<Bullet> getBullets()
        With this method the @Model or the @ArenaManager can get the bullets.
        Returns:
        : the bullets that you want.
